value.title: Hundreds of Amazon Drivers Agree That They Deserve a Union in an Informal Driver-Led Survey
value.excerpt: In just a few short years, Amazon’s warehouse workers have gone from suffering in silence to jobsite walkouts in Minnesota and more recently a full-blown union vote in Alabama. Now it seems another segment of Amazon’s workforce is taking its first steps towards advocating for better conditions.
